EmailTemplate.name: CSO - Requesting New GCC Solution
EmailTemplate.subject: Requesting New GCC Solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Send requests to GCCKM@honeywell.com
Dear Administrator,
Please create a new solution for the following:
Suggested Solution Name: <enter data>
Problem/Question I was trying to solve: <enter data>
How I resolved the Problem/Question: <enter data>
Actions taken to close the ticket if Applicable:
Edit as needed: 1. Change Ticket Type to _____ 2. Fill in Classification fields 3. Change/Leave owner as ______ 4. Change Ticket Status to _______
Additional Keywords: <enter data>
Thank you,
<Enter Name>
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
